title: Lesson 79
paragraph: This lesson focuses on ambition and rivalry, emphasizing competitive, driven, and resolute qualities.

words.meaning: having a strong desire to win or be the best
words.example: He is highly competitive in sports.

words.meaning: having a confident and forceful personality

words.example: The team faced relentless pressure from their opponents.

words.meaning: being motivated by a strong desire to succeed
words.japaneseMeaning: 意欲的な、やる気のある
words.example: She is driven to achieve her career goals.

words.meaning: carefully planned to achieve a particular goal
words.example: They made a strategic move to gain market share.

words.japaneseMeaning: 熾烈な競争の、無慈悲な
words.example: The corporate world can be cutthroat.

words.meaning: having a strong reason to act or accomplish something
words.japaneseMeaning: 意欲的な、やる気のある
words.example: She is highly motivated to succeed.

words.meaning: having or showing great energy or enthusiasm
words.example: He is a zealous supporter of the cause.

words.meaning: having made a firm decision and being resolved not to change it
words.example: She was determined to finish the project on time.

words.japaneseMeaning: 断固とした、揺るぎない
words.example: He remained resolute in his beliefs.
